name: SimCopter
description: Get over SimCity - in action-packed helicopter missions. Soar through 30 pre-built cities, or import your own SimCity 2000 cities - and see them in hyper-realistic 3-D. Either way, the urban skies aren't exactly friendly. There are fires to fight, shipwrecked Sims to save and traffic to un-jam. Complete your missions and reap your rewards: a snazzier copter and a tougher aerial test. SimCity 2000 not required. Nerves of steel recommended.
